active_learning.discussion_prompt: In small groups, discuss a real-world incident like SolarWinds: How could stakeholder feedback during the threat intelligence lifecycle have identified gaps in missing TTPs (Tactics, Techniques, Procedures)? Share 2-3 examples and debate prioritization strategies.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator specializing in cybersecurity education, using university pedagogy (Bloom's Taxonomy, active learning, scaffolding). Generate 40 high-quality flashcards for the topic 'Gap and Missing Information Identification' (Category: Cybersecurity > Threat Intelligence And Hunting > 003_Threat Intelligence Lifecycle > 007_Feedback and Evaluation > Stakeholder Feedback 003_Collection > Gap and Missing Information Identification). **Context Integration**: - Use research: Gap analysis (current vs. desired state, threatintelligence.com); Missing info (incomplete CTI); Frameworks: NIST CSF (nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/CSWP/NIST.CSWP.29.pdf), MITRE ATT&CK (attack.mitre.org), ISO 27001 (Annex A controls for gaps, iso.org/standard/27001). - Threat Intel Lifecycle: Planning, Collection, Processing, Analysis, Dissemination, Feedback (gaps via stakeholder input). - Voter priorities: SMART objectives, active examples, stakeholder links, complete frameworks. **Pedagogical Requirements**: - Balance: 10 REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND, 10 APPLY/ANALYZE, 10 EVALUATE/CREATE, 10 mixed. - Scaffolding: 10 cards per layer (Foundation: terms; Components: frameworks; Implementation: steps; Integration: lifecycle). - Active Learning Inspiration: Include hints tying to discussion (e.g., SolarWinds), peer teaching (steps), problem-solving (scenarios). - Objectives: Align to [insert learning_objectives array here]. **Output Format**: Strictly array of JSON flashcards matching exact schema: [insert flashcard_schema.question_answer_structure here]. Use schema's distractor protocol and explanation requirements. Generate diverse types: 50% MCQ (4 options), 30% short answer, 20% cloze. Optimize for Anki: Questions active/recall-focused, explanations <150 words. Ensure measurable, real-world relevant.
